data.quote: Americans have the right and advantage of being armed - unlike the citizens of other countries whose governments are afraid to trust the people with arms.
data.author: James Madison

data.quote: I found it to be more challenging to be in a huge effects movie, because a lot of the things aren't there. You have to trust the director and react to nothing.
data.author: Katie Holmes

data.quote: Love shouldn't be about jealousy or anything like that. It should be about commitment and being able to trust that person. If you can't have that from the get-go, there's a problem.
data.author: Aaron Carter

data.quote: Sometimes you don't know who you can and cannot trust. I still learn that over and over again.
data.author: Demi Lovato

data.quote: I was going through a little bit of turbulence in my career. And so, it's funny how turbulence itself will make you hold onto something for security. And so the only thing I knew is trust in the Lord and lean not unto your own heart, in all thy ways acknowledge him and he shall direct thy path.
data.author: Emmitt Smith

data.quote: I tend not to trust people who live in very tidy houses. I know that on the surface there is nothing wrong with a person being well-ordered and disciplined. Nothing, except that it leaves the impression of that person having lived in the confines of a stark institution which, although he or she has long since left, remains within.
data.author: Jack Dee
